item.title: CVE-2024-38723|2024-08-02T04:19:20.505Z -- bernhard%20kux -- json%20content%20importer
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Bernhard Kux JSON Content Importer.This issue affects JSON Content Importer: from n/a through 1.5.6.
